item.title: List of 15 senators who voted for the Ruaraka land report
item.description: Senators voted on Tuesday, November 27, for the adoption of the controversial Ruaraka land report which had implicated senior government officers including Interior Cabinet Secretary Fred Matiang'i over irregular payment for acquisition of the land. Senate Public Accounts and Investment committee had implicated Matiang'i for irregular payment of KSh 1.5 billion to businessman Francis Mburu when he was serving in the Education docket. Other officers who were implicated in the report included Principal Secretary in the Ministry of Education Belio Kipsang, National Land Commission Chairman Muhammad Swazuri and his deputy Abigael Mbagaya, Commissioner Tom Konyimbih and Chief Executive Officer Tom Chavangi.

item.title: Delta Police Arrest Uncle, Nephew For Alleged Robbery
item.description: A suspected armed robber, Chigozie Ohamago and his uncle, Patrick Okonkwo, have been arrested by the Delta State police command due to a connection with a robbery case in Okpanam community near Asaba. DSP Onovwakpoyeya in a statement also revealed that one pump action gun and one fabricated pistol was recovered from the suspects by the police.

item.title: Cristiano Ronaldo Arrives Manchester In Style
item.description: International goal record-breaker, Cristiano Ronaldo has arrived in Manchester days after agreeing to a two-year contract with the option to extend for another year with Manchester United. The Portuguese forward who joined the club from Serie A side Juventus arrived at a private terminal at Manchester Airport and was welcomed by the club’s technical director, Darren Fletcher. The 36-year-old was released early from the Portugal squad after picking up a suspension for celebrating his stoppage-time winner in a 2-1 World Cup qualifying win over the Republic of Ireland.

item.title: Father Mbaka Reveals What Will Happen To Nigeria If Nnamdi Kanu Is Hurt (Video)
item.description: Rev Fr Ejike Mbaka of Adoration Ministry Enugu has revealed what will happen if anything happens to the leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra, Nnamdi Kanu. According to Mbaka, Nigeria would collapse if anything happens to the IPOB leader. Mbaka in a video where he was addressing his church members warned the Department of State Services and the Federal Government against maltreating Kanu. The cleric further stated that Kanu is agitating for secession due to bad governance by wicked politicians in the country.

item.title: 'Gov Wike's Demands From Atiku To End PDP Crisis Emerge'
item.description: The reported demands of the Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike from the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar have been revealed. Naija News learned that the camp of Governor Wike insisted that the National Chairman of the party, Iyorchia Ayu must resign from office. Further report has it that Wike’s camp asked that Ayu should be given a dignified exit and accommodated in the new PDP government if it wins the 2023 presidential election.

item.title: Soludo Appoints Osun, Abia Indigenes As Permanent Secretaries In Anambra
item.description: The Anambra State Governor, Chukwuma Soludo, has approved the appointment of Adebayo Ojeyinka, an Osun indigene, among the 18 new permanent secretaries recently appointed across ministries in the state. Making this disclosure in a statement on Friday, the spokesperson of the governor, Christian Aburime, detailed that the appointments were based on merit. Naija News reports that the state government also appointed Joachin Achor from Abia State. Aburime said that a “rigorous and transparent” procedure, comprising a computerized test, a search procedure, and one-on-one meetings with the governor, was used in making the appointments.

item.title: "The Spirit Of Hope 93 Died With MKO"

The lawyer said the combination of Asiwaju Bola Tinubu and Senator Kashim Shettima portends grave implications for Nigeria. Adegboruwa in a post via his Facebook page on Wednesday listed 10 grave implications of a Muslim-Muslim presidential ticket. His position comes after the APC presidential candidate, Bola Tinubu on Sunday unveiled former Borno State Governor, Kashim Shettima as his running mate.

item.title: Shehu Sani Reveals Only Way A Southerner Will Succeed Buhari
item.description: Former Kaduna lawmaker Shehu Sani has revealed the only way a Southerner will succeed Buhari in 2023. As the 2023 elections draw closer different groups have been demanding that the south and in particular, the southeast produce the next president in the country. However the two major political parties PDP and APC have not spoken on the decision to zone their presidential ticket. Sharing his thoughts via Twitter on Tuesday, Sani stated that the only way a Southerner would emerge as president is if both APC and PDP pick a southern candidate.

item.title: Blackout Looms As Kainji Hydroelectric Dam Bursts
item.description: Some parts of Nigeria may soon experience blackouts as one of country’s hydro-power stations, Kainji Hydroelectric Dam in Kainji has been shut down for repairs. The development was confirmed in a statement released on Sunday, September 13 by the Hydro-power station management, Mainstream Energy Solution Limited. According to the report, the hydro-power stations caved in after the opening of the four spillway gates to free surplus water influx caused by heavy rainfall.

item.title: EFCC Detain, Grill Bukola Saraki
item.description: It was gathered that the interrogation is over alleged misappropriation of public funds and money laundering. Saraki, who arrived at the EFCC office around 2pm today, is still being interrogated presently. A senior official confirmed that the former Kwara State governor is in custody. When Naija News reached out to Olu Onemola, an aide to Saraki on New Media, he promised to get back with information. The former Kwara governor had earlier in the day attended the wedding of the daughter of Senator Shaba Lafiagi, Fatimah, in Abuja.

item.title: APC Removes Dapo Abiodun As Convention Appeal Chairman
item.description: Ogun State Governor Dapo Abiodun has been removed as the All Progressives Congress (APC) election appeal Chairman. The South-West state governor was earlier appointed by Governor Mai Mala Buni-led APC caretaker committee to chair the party’s election appeal committee ahead of its national convention slated for March 26, Naija News understands. However, due to the shuffle as a result of the recent crisis in the party, Governor Abiodun has been relieved of the position.

item.title: MASSOB, BIM appeal to UN to divide Nigeria
item.description: - MASSOB, BIM called on the United Nations to divide Nigeria - According to pro-Biafra groups this is the only solution to the current nation's problems Two pro-Biafra groups have appealed to the United Nations and other world leaders to divide Nigeria into six geo-political zones to solve the current crisis. The Movement for Actualization of Sovereign State of Biafra (MASSOB) stated that giving the six geo-political zones in Nigeria self-rule would be the only answer to the many problems in the country.

item.title: Peter Obi Hails Charly Boy At 73
item.description: The presidential candidate of the Labour Party, Peter Obi has hailed legendary singer, Chukwuemeka Oputa, better known as Charly Boy, as he turns 73. Theformer Anambra governor via his verified Twitter on Monday shared a photo of him with the celebrant, celebrating his new age with him. Obi also praised Charly boy for being an advocate of good governance in Nigeria. He noted how the entertainer fearlessly raised his voice against injustice, corruption, and other societal ills that contended with the progress of the country.

item.title: Flex Wheeler - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Retired IFBB professional bodybuilder notable for being one of the greatest in the history of the sport after winning the Arnold Classic five times, a record at the time. His nickname was The Sultan of Symmetry. Before Fame Athletics and martial arts helped him through a tough childhood that included child abuse and suicidal tendencies. He also suffered from dyslexia. He discovered weight training and bodybuilding as a teen. Trivia He became the executive vice president of Generation Iron Fitness Network.

item.title: Is Joe Flanigan Leaving General Hospital? It Remains to Be Seen
item.description: Was Dr. Neil Byrne Really Killed off on ‘General Hospital’?By Kate BrierleyUpdated Sept. 2 2020, 2:34 p.m. ET Source: ABCSoap opera fans are serious about General Hospital, and it’s no surprise as to why. The show has been on for 57 seasons and counting. It got its start on ABC in 1963, with characters and storylines that have spanned decades, keeping fans coming back for more. Naturally, plenty of characters have come and gone over the years.

item.title: Mark Farese - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Otherwise known by his nickname Mayor, he skyrocketed to fame when he appeared in news outlets around the country discussing his massive sneaker collection. In 2016 his rare collection was said to be worth one million dollars. Before Fame His passion for sneakers ignited at the age of ten when his mother and grandfather got him a pair of Air Force 1s. Trivia He has been featured in major magazines like Forbes, GQ, and Fox News.

item.title: Mhubiri adai wanawake ambao huvalia suruali hawataingia mbinguni
item.description: Mhubiri mmoja kutoka Nigeria amewashangaza wengi baada ya kudai kuwa wanawake wanaopenda kuvalia suruali hawataruhusiwa kuingia mbinguni Kulingana na mwinjilisti huyo, wanawake hawastahili kuvalia suruali ila marinda marefu na yasiowabana. Habari Nyingine: KCPE 2019: Gavana Mutahi Kahiga aahidi kumlipia karo mwanafunzi aliyeibuka mshindi kitaifa " Hakuna mwanamke ambaye yuko na mazoea ya kuvalia suruali atakubaliwa kuuona ufalme wa mbinguni, hata mkipinga madai haya, hakuna kinachoweza kubadilisha ukweli wa mambo," Dapo Soyemi alisema.

Though many of them sought to live peacefully and secretly with humans, Secret Invasion has put Skrulls at the forefront.

item.title: Bomb Explosions Rock Maiduguri - 51 Dead, 60 Injured in Multiple attack.
item.description: The capital city of Borno state, Maiduguri, is under attack from insurgents believed to be members of the extremist Boko Haram sect.  third explosion was reported, but it has not been officially confirmed. Terrorists in two vans, pretending to be firewood suppliers, detonated the bombs at a densely populated Ajilari ward, Jere Council area of Maiduguri, near Ngomari-Bulumkutu. Yesterday The Commissioner of Police in Borno, Alhaji Lawal Tanko, confirmed the blasts. Tanko said 35 bodies had been evacuated:

item.title: Dokubo Asari Stages Anti-#BringBackOurGirls Protest
item.description: The leader of Niger Delta Peoples Volunteer Force (NDPVF) Mujahid Dokubo Asari insisted that the abduction of Chibok schoolgirls is a scam. It would be recalled that last week he took to his Facebook page to make this claim raising the questions that made him doubt the fact of kidnap.  Yesterday Niger Delta activist once again confirmed his position by staging the Anti-#BringbackOurGirls protest. The protesters' placards read: "Don’t play politics with my name, Chibok is a scam"

item.title: How to join a basketball team in Nigeria
item.description: Basketball career can make you popular, famous, and rich. Who doesn’t dream about the achievements of Michael Jordan or Magic Johnson? Want to know how to join a basketball team in Nigeria? Read on! Photo: www.medianigeria.com Nigerian basketball playersIf you want to build your basketball career in our country, you should get into the game and become the best among many Nigerian basketball players who dream about fame and playing real games in the numerous leagues.

item.title: Is Alphy Hoffman Dead? Corey Feldman's Alleged Abuser Is off the Grid
item.description: Is Alphy Hoffman dead? The man accused of molesting Corey Feldman as a teenager retreated from the spotlight. A little over two years ago, former child star Corey Feldman revealed the name of a man he claims molested him in the late 1980s. That man is one-time Hollywood club owner Alphy Hoffman. Tales of Alphy’s alleged abuse are scattered throughout Feldman’s new documentary, My Truth: The Rape of Two Coreys, which also details the supposed assaults of Corey Haim, who died at the age of 38 in 2010.

item.title: Chris Pratt and Anna Fariss Son Faced Health Issues From the Moment He Was Born
item.description: Chris Pratt’s son Jack is seven years old now, but he was born with a brain bleed that left his parents worried about his health for months. Source: Getty ImagesChris Pratt and Anna Faris are no longer a couple, but they still co-parent their son. Jack, who is now 7, was born two months early, and suffered from a range of health complications as a result of his premature birth. For a time, Chris and Anna weren’t sure if he would ever leave the hospital.

item.title: juztjosh - Age, Family, Bio
Northern Bishops Who Met With Tinubu Not Our Members
item.description: The Pentecostal Fellowship of Nigeria (PFN) has dissociated itself from the meeting between the Presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu, and some Northern Bishops. Naija News recalls that the APC presidential candidate had met with the Pentecostal Bishops Forum of Northern Nigeria in Abuja last week Thursday. Speaking at the meeting, Tinubu said his decision to pick former Governor of Borno State, Kashim Shettima, as his running mate was not a threat to the Christian community.

item.title: Steven Adler - Age, Family, Bio
Supreme Court Decides On Dan Orbihs Faction Suit
item.description: The Supreme Court has ruled against a suit filed by the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) faction in Edo State loyal to Dan Osi Orbih. Naija News reports that Orbih and Governor Godwin Obaseki have been at loggerheads following activities before and during the party’s primary elections in May 2022. The duo have been at war over who controls the affairs of the party in the State. In the power tussle, Orbih instituted an appeal at the apex court.

item.title: 400-Level Abia University Student Dies During Cult Clash
item.description: A 400-level History and International Relations student of Abia State University died during a cult clash over the weekend. Naija News learnt that the Abia State Government confirmed the death on Monday, after the week’s State Executive Council meeting chaired by the state governor, Alex Otti. Briefing journalists,  the Commissioner for Information and Culture, Okey Kanu, said the state government has dispatched some security agencies to the institution to restore normalcy.

item.title: Abia Joins Lagos, Bans Use Of Plastics, Styrofoam Foils
item.description: Governor Alex Otti‘s led government of Abia State has issued a ban on the use of Styrofoam foils, popularly known as ‘Take Away’. The development was announced during the weekend by the state Ministry of Environment, Naija News reports. In the statement signed and issued by the State Commissioner for Environment, Philemon Ogbonna, the government enforced the ban on the use of ‘Take Away’ as food containers in the state, emphasizing that the product had already been prohibited in other states, such as Lagos, and urged the public to immediately stop using the foils until a thorough investigation is conducted to assess the potential risks to public health.

item.title: What Was Linda Lewis Cause of Death? Singer Died at 72
item.description: "Nightingale" Singer Linda Lewis Passed Away at 72 Years OldBy Jamie LernerMay 5 2023, Published 9:46 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesEnglish singer-songwriter Linda Ann Fredericks, aka Linda Lewis, died on May 4, 2023, at 72 years old. Linda rose to fame in the 1970s for her version of Betty Everett’s “Shoop Shoop (It’s in His Kiss)” and worked with several titans of the pop music industry, such as David Bowie, Rod Stewart, Jamiroquai, and more.

item.title: When Is the 'Roblox' Voice Chat Release Date What Do Fans Think of It?
item.description: 'Roblox' Is Adding a Voice Chat Feature but Not Everyone Is Happy About It By Kori WilliamsUpdated April 29 2021, 10:14 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesFans of the game Roblox have something to look forward to...or not. Honestly, it depends. The game is set to add a voice chat feature. Although to some this may be welcome news, many fans are concerned about what this means for the game and its players going forward.

item.title: Who Is Clark Costello on 'Busch Family Brewed'? He Broke Haley's Heart
item.description: Haley's Boyfriend Clark on 'Busch Family Brewed' Has Strong Ties to St. LouisBy Allison CacichUpdated April 4 2020, 5:40 p.m. ET Source: InstagramThere are a lot of people to keep track of on MTV’s The Busch Family Brewed, which follows a branch of the Anheuser-Busch brewing dynasty. One major storyline on the reality show’s first season has been the rocky relationship between Haley Busch and her boyfriend, Clark Costello. The aspiring actress is waiting for a proposal from her longtime beau, but the couple’s disagreements over where to live might derail any hope of an engagement.

item.title: DHQ Directs Service Chiefs To Compile War Items
item.description: The Defence Headquarters has reportedly commenced preparations for the possible mobilisation of troops and equipment for a possible confrontation with coup leaders in the Niger Republic. This is coming amidst directives by the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) for troops to be on standby. The decision was taken at an extraordinary summit of the ECOWAS Authority of Heads of States and Government hosted by President Bola Tinubu in Abuja.

item.description: -Kulivuka sokomoko kufuatia maandamano yaliyoandaaliwa na muungano wa NASA katika baadhi ya kaunti nchini Jumatatu, Septemba 26, kutaka baadhi ya makamishna wa IEBC kujiuzulu -Waandamanaji hao waliimba, wakacheza, na kupiga filimbi na wakati mwingine , polisi walilazimika kuwatawanya kwa vitoza machozi -Mmoja wa waandamani hao aliwaacha wengi kinywa wazi alipoamua kuvua nguo zake za ndani mbele ya wapiga picha licha ya kuwa mwanamke Pakua APP mpya ya TUKO upate habari BURE!

item.title: Peseiro Makes Few Changes As Super Eagles Squad For Saudi Arabia, Mozambique Matches Emerges
item.description: The Super Eagles squad to play against Saudi Arabia and Mozambique in an upcoming international friendly has been unveiled. Naija News reports that Jose Santos Peseiro‘s side will face the Green Falcons of Saudi Arabia on October 13, 2023, in Portimão, Portugal, followed by a clash with the Mambas of Mozambique three days later. Ahead of the matches, defenders Kenneth Omeruo and Bright Osayi-Samuel, midfielder Alex Iwobi, and forward Terem Moffi were recalled to the squad, while Fisayo Dele-Bashiru got his first-ever invitation, and goalkeepers Francis Uzoho, Adebayo Adeleye, and Olorunleke Ojo were retained.

item.title: South Africa Bust Another Nigerian Arms Deal, Seizes $5.7m
item.description: Barely three weeks after South African authorities seized a private jet in Johannesburg which transported $9.3million in cash packed in several suitcases for arms purchase, they have yet again confiscated another US$5.7 million arms deal money from Nigeria, South Africa-based City Express reports. According to the report, the $5.7 million (about N952 million), alleged to be proceeds of illegal transactions, was seized by the South Africa’s Asset Forfeiture Unit of the National Prosecuting Authority.

item.title: Teen Didn't Know Juul Pods Had Nicotine and Is Considering a Lawsuit
item.description: Teen Sues Juul Because She Didn't Know Their Pods Had Nicotine in ThemBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Nov. 26 2019, 8:32 a.m. ET A teen is considering suing Juul because she was unaware that the vape pen's cartridges contained nicotine and blames them for becoming "reliant" on their product. When I first hit a juul, I personally didn't know that it had nicotine in it. After pushing my lungs back down my throat and my coughing subsided, I asked, "

item.title: Does Johnny Orlando Have a Girlfriend? He's Been Shipped Plenty of Times
item.description: Fans of the singer-songwriter/actor are obsessed with the 17-year-old. And plenty of them are dying to know: Does Johnny Orlando have a girlfriend? Source: Getty ImagesCanadian singer-songwriter Johnny Orlando took the teen music scene by storm when he started posting covers of popular artists — such as Justin Bieber and Austin Mahone — to his YouTube channel all the way back in 2012. It was hard to believe he wasn't even 10 years old at the time.

item.title: Former BBNaija Housemate Bags Doctorate Degree From US Varsity
item.description: Former Big Brother Naija Housemate, Emmanuel Umoh, has bagged a doctorate degree from a University in the United States of America. Naija News reports that the reality TV star made this known in a post via his Instagram page, alongside photos of the graduation ceremony. According to the BBNaija Star, he has been conferred a Doctor of Philosophy in Business Administration. He further expressed appreciation to God for his latest achievement and dedicated the degree to everyone who had contributed to his success in life.

item.title: JhbTeam - Age, Family, Bio
Lisa Vanderpump's Feud With Dorit Kemsley Is the Reason She's Not Returning to 'RHOBH'
item.description: After being on the show for nine seasons, original 'RHOBH' cast member Lisa Vanderpump decided not to return for Season 10. Why did she leave? Source: Getty ImagesWhen Lisa Vanderpump joined The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills cast in Season 1, the restauranteur stood out for her high-class lifestyle and witty comments about her co-stars. For nine seasons, fans tuned in to see Lisa expand her multiple businesses while juggling her family life.

item.title: Mohamed Diab - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Egyptian singer known for combining folk music with modern sounds who released the hit singles "Ghamazat," "El3aw" and "ElSha7n Fasal." He shares lifestyle and backstage photos on Instagram for more than 1.3 million followers. Before Fame He became affiliated with Free Music Art Production. Trivia He won multiple Middle East Music Awards in 2010. Family Life He's been based in Cairo, Egypt. Associated With He and actor Ahmed El Sakka posed for a photo together on his Instagram page.

item.title: Cash Anthony Hudson - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Widely known as the younger son of prolific Guns N' Roses guitarist Slash. His mother is Perla Ferrar, who was his father's second wife. Before Fame His father rose to international acclaim as the energetic guitarist for the iconic rock group Guns N' Roses during the 1980's. Trivia In 2005, his father was named Best Guitarist in a survey conducted by Esquire Magazine. Family Life He has one older brother named London.

item.title: Evan Ross on Family, Fame, and Diana Ross's Legacy
item.description: Here's How Evan Ross Keeps His High-Profile Family Life Low-Key (EXCLUSIVE)Evan Ross and his wife, Ashley Simpson Ross, bonded over their shared experience of living their early lives under a microscope. By Pretty HonoreMar. 26 2024, Published 3:13 p.m. ET Source: Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images for DiorThere are few songstresses as prolific as Diana Ross. From her rise to fame as a member of The Supremes to her solo career as Miss Ross, Diana has racked up the accolades over the years.

item.title: Ningependa sana baba wa watoto wangu wawe kama babangu mzazi, asema Akothee
item.description: - Mwanamuziki tajika,Akothee amsifu babake mzazi na kudai kuwa hakuna mwanaume yeyote anaweza kulingananishwa naye hasa wanaume aliojaliwa nao watoto - Alikumbuka kisa moja ambapo alitumiwa KSh 300 kutoka kwa mmoja wa baba watoto wake alipohitaji karo ya shule Mwanamuziki maarufu, Akothee, kila mara husisimua mitandao ya kijamii hasa anaposimilia na kurejelea maisha yake ya hapo awali. Habari Nyingine: Mtangazaji tajika ageuka mkunga na kumzalisha mwanamke kando ya barabara (video)

item.title: Soldiers Foil Kidnap Attempt On Kogi Travellers, Kill Terrorists In Zamfara
item.description: A kidnap attempt on passengers onboard three commercial buses along Akpata-Obajana Road in Lokoja Local Government Area of Kogi State was thwarted by Troops of the Nigerian Army. Naija News reports that the Director of Army Public Relations, Major General Onyema Nwachukwu, disclosed this in a statement on Friday. Nwachukwu said the troops engaged the kidnappers in a hot pursuit, and some of the rescued passengers who suffered injuries have been admitted at the hospital for medical treatment.

item.title: Tinubu Reacts To Ondo Catholic Church Attack, Says Massacre Reprehensible
item.description: Frontline presidential aspirant and former Governor of Lagos State, Bola Tinubu said the attack on worshippers at the St. Francis Catholic Church in Owo, Ondo State is highly reprehensible. The presidential hopeful stated that the violent attack on Sunday morning shocked the conscience of the nation and shattered the peace of the ancient town of Owo. Tinubu said in a statement by his media office in Abuja while reacting to the attack on the Catholic Church, Owa-luwa Street in Owo Local Government Area of the state.

item.title: Boko Haram Attack in Mubi. Troops Flee For Safety
item.description: Following Boko Haram attack in Mubi, Adamawa state which resulted in residents fleeing including troops, the Nigerian Defence Headquarters has confirmed that an entire battalion of soldiers fled the town of Mubi. According to Sahara Reporters,  the Nigerian Defence Headquarters will carry out an investigation as to why troops fled the town when the militants attacked. Meanwhile a senior military source has said there was no reason for the Special Operation Battalion troops stationed in Mubi to have fled as in a bid to put an end to the Boko Haram, an engage in a fierce battle with the sect, five artillery tanks had been brought into Mubi in the last few days.

item.title: Filomena Cautela - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Portuguese actress and television presenter who found fame through her roles on various telenovelas, including Vingança, Morangos com Açúcar and Santa Bárbara. As a host, she is known primarily for her work on 5 Para a Meia Noite. Before Fame She got her start as a stage actress, appearing in a production of Antigone in 2000. Trivia She has more than 650,000 followers on Instagram. Family Life She has dated Gabriela Sobral.

item.title: Johnny Depp Just Crashed The Pirates Of The Caribbean Ride At Disneyland
item.description: Johnny Depp Just Crashed The Pirates Of The Caribbean Ride At DisneylandBy Mark PygasUpdated Nov. 20 2018, 7:08 p.m. ET Source: GettyThe fifth movie in the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise, Dead Men Tell No Tales, is set to release worldwide next month, and as with any major movie franchise, the stars are in promo mode. Actor Johnny Depp, who plays Captain Jack Sparrow, was filming at the Pirates ride in Disneyland, and decided to treat some lucky park-goers to a show.

item.title: Shannon De Lima - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Model who is best known for marrying salsa singer Marc Anthony in 2014. Additionally, she is known for having competed in the Miss Earth Venezuela pageant, where she finished as the runner-up. Before Fame She began her career as a model by participating in local beauty pageants throughout Venezuela. Trivia She has studied communications, interior design, and film acting. Family Life She and Marc Anthony split in 2017. She has a son named Daniel from her relationship with actor Manuel Sosa.

item.title: Was Kinky Friedman's Net Worth as Big as His Personality?
item.description: Kinky Friedman Didn't Perform for Free — Let's Look at the Late Artist's Net WorthFor a man who favored a black cowboy hat, Kinky Friedman was a fella who wore many hats in life. By Jennifer TisdalePublished June 27 2024, 4:17 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesAnyone with a passing awareness of Kinky Friedman would probably say they liked the cut of that man's jib. His signature style consisted of a head of curly hair hiding beneath a black cowboy hat that was usually resting above a smirk and a cigar.

item.title: 'Why Wike's Camp Is Angry With PDP, Atiku' (Details)
item.description: The reconciliation talk between the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar and the Governor of Rivers State, Nyesom Wike, has broken down. The move by the party and the former Vice President to gain Wike’s support in 2023 got affected after the party appointed the Governor of Sokoto State,  Aminu Tambuwal, as the Chairman of the PDP Presidential Management Committee. Governor Wike’s camp in the past few months had condemned the party for ignoring the South in its leadership position.

item.title: COVID-19: Low numbers recorded as churches reopen in Kenya under strict guidelines
item.description: - Many Kenyans avoided churches today, Sunday, July 19 despite the resumption of worship services - The worship places that reopened also observed the strict containment protocols laid out by the health ministry - Measures such as ample sanitisers, enough water and temperature checks were observed Churches recorded low turn out as worship services resumed earlier today, Sunday, July 19. At the same time, most churches complied with the strict protocols laid out by the Ministry of Health such as having sanitisers, enough water for handwashing, and checking of temperature, among others.

item.title: Daniel Vargas (Instagram Star) - Age, Family, Bio

item.description: Kauli ya Mhariri: Bloga wetu leo ni Kennedy Ambula. Anachanganua sababu ya wananchi ya kukoma kukimbilia maombi ya amani kabla ya kutekeleza majukumu yanayohakikisha kuwa kuna amani. Anaeleza sababu za kuwataka wananchi kukoma kumharibia jina Raila Odinga kwa kusema alihusika na machafuko na kusaka waliosababisha hayo kikamilifu. "Tunapoelekea katika uchaguzi mkuu, inashangaza kwamba watu wameanza kufanya mikutano ya maombi kwa ajili ya amani.. Wananchi kupitia kwa IEBC wanafaa kuhakikisha kuna uchaguzi wa huru na haki Agosti 8 ili waweze kupata amani.

item.title: This Holiday Pizza Is Grossing Out the Entire Internet
item.description: This 'Holiday' Pizza Is Covered In Melted Candy Canes And People Are HorrifiedBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Nov. 18 2019, 2:17 p.m. ET Source: twitterHey, are you someone who would actually enjoy scarfing down melted candy canes burned into an otherwise perfectly good cheese pizza? Then boy do we have the holiday dinner treat for you. If you are like most other sane human beings, however... well, we're sorry, but prepare to be super grossed out.

Source: GettyRemember that wild time when everyone was trying to pass any type of creature they could get their hands on as an emotional support animal to bring aboard an airplane with them? Everything from peacocks to tortoises to goats and monkeys and turkeys, people have tried to attach "emotional support"

item.title: Jordan Wiseley - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Reality star who first rose to fame on the 28th season of The Real World: Portland. He later went on to compete on the MTV series The Challenge: Battle of the Exes II. He also became the founder of Strapped Manufactured Goods Co. Before Fame He studied business at Oklahoma State University and later went onto explore marketing at the University of Central Oklahoma. Trivia In 2015, he earned his first acting role playing Ben Bryant in the Tyler Perry Series If Loving You Is Wrong.

item.title: Kasisi ataka wasichana wanaopachikwa mimba wakiwa bado shuleni wakamatwe
item.description: - Kasisi wa kanisa Katoliki nchini Tanzania amewataka wanafunzi wenye umri mdogo wanaopachikwa mimba kuchukuliwa hatua kali ya kisheria - Kasisi huyo alidai kuwa msichana wa shule anayepatikana na ujamzito atakamatwa na maafisa wa polisi na kuzuliwa gerezani bila kujali hali yake - Kulingana na kasisi huyo ,hiyo ni njia moja ya kupunguza visa vya wasichana wenye umri mdogo kupachikwa mimba kiholela Kasisi wa kanisa katoliki nchini Tanzania amewashangaza wengi baada ya kudai kuwa wasichana wenye umri mdogo wanaopachikwa mimba watachukuliwa hatua kali ya kisheria.

item.title: Woman Rescued From Near-Death Situation After Husband Starved Her For One Year
item.description: An aged woman, identified as Sadiya, has been rescued from an excruciating condition after her husband detained her in the house for one year without food in Nguru town, Yobe State. Naija News gathered that the victim, who hails from Kano State with four children was rescued last week from the impoverished condition by her biological mother, Hadiza. A source who spoke with DAILY POST revealed that the mother of the victim travelled to see her daughter when she felt uncomfortable with her voice during a phone conversation.

item.title: 5 Seconds of Summer - Members, Ages, Trivia
item.description: Often called 5sos, the band consists of former YouTube celebrities who came together to form a band. Their first major tour was opening for Hot Chelle Rae in 2012. They found additional acclaim touring with One Direction in 2013. Trivia Their self-titled debut album, released in 2014, reached #1 on the US Billboard 200. Their next two albums, Sounds Good Feels Good (2015) and Youngblood (2018), hit #1 on the chart as well.  In 2020, the band released an album, 'Calm' which spells out the first initials of the band members' names: Calum, Ashton, Luke and Michael.

item.title: Atiku Vows To Meet With Wike Over Grievances
item.description: The presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party, Atiku Abubakar on Thursday promised to hold a reconciliation meeting with the Governor of Rivers State, Nyesom Wike. Atiku stated this a few hours after returning to Nigeria to support the governorship candidate of the PDP in Osun State, Ademola Adeleke in the party’s rally. The former vice president while speaking on the grievances of Governor Wike and some PDP leaders said it’s nothing new in politics.

item.title: Daniel Bryan - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: WWE wrestler who became a multiple-time WWE Champion and also won the World Heavyweight Championship as well as the The US Championship. He's also a WWE Tag Team Champion and winner of the WrestleMania 31 Intercontinental Championship. Before Fame He began training at the Texas Wrestling Academy after graduating from high school. Trivia He is considered one of the Founding Fathers of ring of Honor wrestling. Family Life He married fellow wrestler Brie Bella in 2014.

item.title: Seneta wa Jubilee aliyedaiwa kuwa 'FISI' asherekea siku ya kipekee na mkewe (picha)
item.description: Mtetezi mkubwa wa naibu rais William Ruto na uongozi wa Jubilee amefuzu na shahada ya uzamifu (PhD) na kujiunga na kundi dogo la wanasiasa wasomi zaidi nchini Kenya Seneta wa Elgeyo-Marakwet Kipchumba amefuzu na shahada ya uzamifu (PhD) kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Washington College of Law kilichoko Marekani. Picha alizochapisha mtandaoni zilionyesha senetra huyo akiwa amevalia gauni la mahafala la buluu katika picha alizopiga na mkewe Gladys Wanjiru na marafiki zake.

item.title: These Accounts Are Good Family Fun
item.description: TikTok is made for so many different kinds of videos and overall content and there are also tons of families who have accounts to follow. If there's a market for an adorable family to gain social media followers and a solid fan base, they will find it. So when TikTok started becoming a *thing* even before 2020, some families jumped on the bandwagon and now there are tons of TikTok families you can follow.

item.title: Bob Probert - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Former forward for the Detroit Red Wings and Chicago Blackhawks, known as a fighter and enforcer, one half of the much-feared Bruise Brothers. Before Fame He played with the Brantford Alexanders of the Ontario Hockey League before being drafted by the Red Wings in 1983. Trivia He was arrested in 2004 after an altercation stemming from drugs and was subdued with tasers by law enforcement. Family Life His father-in-law Dan Parkinson attempted unsuccessfully to save his life with CPR on the day of his death.

item.title: Does Elon Musk Have a Stutter? Why Some Wonder If He Does
item.description: After Listening to Elon Musk Interview Donald Trump, Some Think He Has a StutterElon Musk has never publicly admitted to having a stutter. By Joseph AllenPublished Aug. 13 2024, 11:13 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesThings did not go super smoothly for Elon Musk and Donald Trump during their planned interview on Twitter on Aug. 12. The event started late, and Musk claimed that a DDos attack was the reason why. Once the event did start, though, those listening discovered that they had another question about Elon Musk.

item.title: INEC Announces Time For Collation Of Election Results
item.description: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has disclosed that it will begin the final collation of election results from the Anambra governorship polls by 9pm today. This follows the conclusion of the supplementary election in Ihiala local government area which had earlier forced the suspension of the election result collation. The supplementary polls kicked off as scheduled on Tuesday and as earlier communicated by INEC, voting is planned to end by 4pm, and sorting and counting are now in progress.

item.title: Nigerian Government Confirms Boko Haram Kidnapping
item.description: Security officials have confirmed the abduction of at least 100 female students in Borno State. The girls, final year students of the Government Girls Secondary School Chibok, Chibok Local Government Area of the state, were kidnapped from their school on Monday night. The incident occurred about three weeks after the state government closed down all public schools to avert further attacks on students. The Boko Haram terrorist group has attacked many schools in Northeast Nigeria killing scores of students and staff.

Debo Ologunagba, made the claim in a statement in Abuja on Monday. item.title: 'Mountain Men' Cast, Watch Full Episodes
item.description: Mountain Men premiered on the History Channel in 2012 and follows a group of survivalists all across the United States. item.title: CBN Raises Interest Rate To 22.75%
item.description: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has raised the Monetary Policy Rate (MPR) by four hundred basis points to 22.75 per cent from 18.75 per cent. The apex bank Governor, Yemi Cardoso. announced this after the first Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) meeting for the year in Abuja on Tuesday. Cardoso also said the MPC also raised the Cash Reserve Ratio (CRR) to forty-five per cent while the liquidity ratio was left unchanged at thirty per cent.

item.title: Lawmaker, Oyeleke Dumps APC For PDP
item.description: The lawmaker representing Ogo-Oluwa/Surulere State Constituency in the Oyo State House of Assembly, Simeon Oyeleke has dumped the All Progressives Congress (APC). Naija News learnt that the lawmaker dumped the APC for the Peoples Democratic Party ahead of the 2023 general elections. Oyeleke was elected on the platform of APC in 2019 to represent the constituency in the state House of Assembly. The lawmaker on Wednesday announced his defection from APC to PDP.

item.title: Sheath Your Sword, PDP BoT Chairman Tells Atiku, Wike
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) Board of Trustees Chairman, Walid Jibrin, has advised the party’s presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar, and Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State to immediately reconcile their differences. In a statement on Thursday, Jibrin advised Atiku and Wike alongside their camps to close ranks and sheath their sword in the interest of the party. He also urged camps of both politicians to remain calm and never create confusion about the state of the party, adding that they should allow efforts to resolve the party’s internal crisis to materialise.

item.title: APC Confirms Stolen Money At Its National Secretariat, Gives More Details
item.description: The All Progressives Congress (APC) has confirmed that a parcel containing a sum of money in US dollars was stolen at its national secretariat in Abuja. The National Publicity Secretary of the APC, Felix Morka who gave the confirmation in a statement on Thursday put the figure of the missing money at $50,000. He however clarified that the money does not belong to the party neither is it connected to the proceeds from the sale of nomination and expression of interest forms.

He wrote: “Deep down I really want this to be my album cover.

Senate Passes N895bn Supplementary Budget For Second Reading
item.description: The 9th Senate on Wednesday passed the 2021 Supplementary Appropriation Bill of N895, 842, 465, 917 for the second reading. The budget was passed for second reading a day after the President of the Senate, Ahmad Lawan read President Muhammadu Buhari’s letter seeking the Red Chamber’s approval of the budget. The supplementary budget contained funds to purchase military equipment and the COVID-19 vaccine programme. The Senate President after the budget was passed for second reading, referred it to the Senate Committee on Appropriations, to report back on Tuesday.

item.title: Why Do I Keep Dreaming About My Ex? Do I Still Have Feelings?
item.description: Here’s Why You Keep Having Dreams About Your Ex (It’s Not Because You Miss Them)By Abi TravisUpdated July 10 2020, 2:36 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesWe’ve all heard the theory that your dreams are your brain’s way of processing and interpreting your life. For instance, if you constantly have dreams about your teeth falling out, it may mean that you are feeling super anxious about something. If you dream about needing to take a final for a class you’ve never attended (even if you haven’t been in school for years), that could indicate that in real life, you feel reluctant to do something you know you should do.

item.title: Open Grazing Ban: Expect No Peace In Nigeria
item.description: Southern governors have been told to expect no peace for refusing to back off from the ban on open grazing in the region. Naija News reports that Southern governors following incessant killings and attacks by alleged Fulani herdsmen in their various states, declared that open grazing will no longer be allowed in other to curb troubles between farmers and herders. The state leaders had also declared September 1, 2021, as the commencement date for the implementation of the ban.

item.description: The Borno State Government has announced its plans to reintegrate over 1,000 repentant Boko Haram fighters into society. item.title: How to make Kuli Kuli at home: A savory and nutritious recipe
item.description: Kuli Kuli is a popular snack in Nigeria, Benin, Ghana, and northern Cameroon. The refreshment is primarily made from peanuts, and the Dagbon people of Ghana and Nupe people of Nigeria were the first communities to make it. Other West African cultures learned from them and improved the recipe over time. This article explains how to make Kuli Kuli at home for personal consumption or sale. Many premium hotels worldwide have Kuli Kuli on their snack menus.

item.title: Current Constitution Cannot Address Challenges In The Country
item.description: A former Secretary-General of the Commonwealth, Emeka Anyaoku, has stated that the current constitution and governance system in Nigeria cannot address the economic challenges facing the country. The elder statesman shared his reservations while speaking with journalists at his country home in Obosi, Idemili North Local Government Area of Anambra State on Saturday. According to him, poverty, insecurity, and infrastructural breakdown, among others are some of the “serious challenges” in the country that the constitution has failed to tackle.

item.title: Ighodalo Speaks On Claims Of Obasekis Backing His Governorship Ambition
item.description: A governorship aspirant of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Edo State, Asue Ighodalo, has dismissed claims of Governor Godwin Obaseki backing his ambition. There have been speculations in many quarters that Ighodalo, a seasoned lawyer and business leader, is enjoying Governor Obaseki of Edo’s backing and is favoured to succeed him. But speaking during an interview on Channels Television‘s Sunrise Daily on Monday, Ighodalo said the claims of Obaseki supporting him as a distraction are plots to distract him from his journey to becoming the Edo State governor.

item.title: John Bunny - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Plump American comedian and silent film actor who is considered to be one of the first modern celebrities. Before Fame He worked as a grocery clerk, joined a touring minstrel show, and was the stage manager for various companies. Early on in the show, Josh told his tribe he was a personal trainer, when in fact he is a surgical podiatrist to seem less of a threat.

item.title: Kogi Is Nigerias Most Backward State PDP
item.description: The opposition Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has described Kogi State as the most backward state in the country. The National Publicity Secretary of the party, Kola Ologbondiyan, stated this during a tour of the PDP offices in the state on Saturday. Ologbondiyan said that Governor Yahaya Bello of Kogi State deserves no commendation as he sits over the most backward state in the country. The PDP noted that Kogi is backward due to the “much devastation, infrastructural decay, poverty and institutionalised hopelessness” under which the people live.

item.title: Atiku Reacts To Wike's Accusation Of Falsehood
item.description: The Presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar, has reacted to the accusation made by Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State of falsehood. Naija News recalls that the former vice president had in a recent interview said he chose Governor Ifeanyi Okowa of Delta State as his running mate because he could work with him amicably. In response to Atiku’s interview, Wike, while speaking with journalists on Friday at the international wing of the Port Harcourt International Airport, accused the PDP presidential flagbearer of falsehood.

item.title: Tension As APC National Chairman, Adamu Suspends Party Directors
item.description: The National Chairman of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Senator Abdullahi Adamu, has indefinitely suspended all departmental directors at the party headquarters in Abuja. Naija News understands that the APC chairman ordered the directors to proceed on an indefinite suspension in a letter last week Friday. Recall that the former Nasarawa governor had on assumption of office on April 1 hinted at the possibility of reorganising the national secretariat. Following his assumption of office, Adamu began the remodelling of the party secretariat, thereby relocating his office from the third to the ground floor.

item.title: 2023: Igbos Should Convince Nigeria On Suceeding Buhari
item.description: Former Governor Peter Obi of Anambra State has asked the South Easterners to convince other regions why an Igbo president should emerge in 2023. In an interview on ARISE NEWS on Monday, Obi said the South East must make a “convincing argument” to Nigerians why the region should produce President Muhammadu Buhari’s successor. The former vice presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party in the 2019 elections also urged the region to embrace the politics of “engagement and consultation and not confrontation”.

item.title: Bayer Leverkusen Gives Update On Victor Boniface's Surgery
item.description: Bayer Leverkusen have confirmed that Nigerian striker, Victor Boniface, had a successful surgery on Wednesday, January 10, to treat a groin injury. Victor Boniface, who had to withdraw from the Super Eagles of Nigeria 2023 AFCON squad due to an injury, has commenced his rehabilitation process, which could last until April this year. “Victor Boniface was successfully operated today (Wednesday) in Berlin. The striker will return to Leverkusen later this week to start his rehabilitation process,” Bayer Leverkusen announced on X.

item.title: Gov Makinde Sends Warning To Schools, Agencies Over Hijab Wearing By Female Muslims
item.description: The Governor of Oyo State, Seyi Makinde has warned that no Hijab-wearing female Muslim in the state should be ridiculed at schools and their various workplaces. Naija News understands that Makinde’s warning is coming following the recent case of a female student who was harassed in class at the Ladoke Akintola University of Technology (LAUTECH) Ogbomoso. In a statement issued on Tuesday, February 1, the state governor strongly warned heads of government agencies and institutions in the state, never to attempt to harass anyone for wearing Hijab.

item.title: John Terry Names Club To Win 2021/2022 Premier League Title
item.description: English professional football manager, John Terry, has named Chelsea as the most advantageous club to win the ongoing 2021/2022 Premier League season. Naija News understands that Chelsea is currently leading the EPL table with 29 points, 3 points above Pep Guardiola’s side and 4 points above Jurgen Klopp’s Reds.

item.title: Kroos Announces Retirement From International Football
item.description: Germany midfielder Toni Kroos said Friday he was retiring from international football, days after the team was knocked out of Euro 2020 by England. “I have played 106 times for Germany. There will not be another time,” wrote the 31-year-old Real Madrid player on Twitter. “I had already made the decision to retire after this tournament for some time,” he added, referring to the European championships. “It had been clear to me for a while that I will not be available for the World Cup 2022 in Qatar.

item.title: What Peter Obi Said About Awkuzu SARS Killings
item.description: The presidential candidate of the Labour Party, Peter Obi, has refuted claims that he knew about the killings of innocent citizens by the Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS) in Awkuzu in Anambra State, during his tenure as the Governor of the State. Naija News reports that some critics of the LP Presidenial candidate had blamed him for the killings and torture carried out by the now-disbanded police outfit in the South East state. During an appearance on a programme on Arise News on Monday, Obi said the police outfit was already in the state before he became the governor and he had no control over its mode of operations during his tenure.

item.description: The presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Ahmed Tinubu, said his preferred running mate will be announced soon. item.title: Military Jets Bomb Home Of Notorious Bandit, Bokkolo In Sokoto, Mother, Wife Trapped
item.description: Nigerian security forces have executed an air raid on the residence of a notorious bandit leader in Sokoto State known as Bokkolo. The raid was said to have been carried out in a joint operation by operatives of the Nigeria Army, Air Force, Police, Department of State Services (DSS), and others. The security forces were led by the General Officer Commanding 8 Division of the Nigerian Army, Sokoto, Naija News gathered.

item.title: PDP Releases Official Timetable For 2021 Congresses
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party‘s National Working Committee on Thursday approved the timetable and schedule of activities for the year 2021 party congresses in nine states. According to the spokesperson of the party, Kola Ologbondiyan, “Congresses have been scheduled to be conducted in Lagos, Oyo, Adamawa, Kebbi, Borno, Kogi, Osun, Kwara and Ebonyi states respectively.” “In the case of Lagos, Oyo, Adamawa, Kebbi, Borno, Kogi, Osun and Kwara states, the tenure of the Excos by Section 47(1) of the PDP Constitution (as amended) would be expiring, having been elected in 2017.

item.title: 'I Dont Want To Get Old And Regret Not Doing What I Love
item.description: Winner of the Big Brother Naija ‘Shine Ya Eye’ Edition Whitemoney has pleaded with critics of his music career to support him as there is no going back on his choice of being in the music industry. In a recent interview with media personality, Olamide Famuwagun, Whitemoney said music is a passion for him but understands that many of his fans want him to open a restaurant. Recall Whitemoney displayed his cooking skills during the reality TV show which many speculated was a strategy to win the show.

item.title: APC Expels Former National Vice Chairman, Hilliard Eta
item.description: The National Executive Committee (NEC) of the All Progressives Congress (APC) has suspended its former National Vice Chairman, South-south, and ex-acting factional Chairman Hilliard Eta. The decision was part of resolutions taken during the NEC meeting which held at the Aso Rock Villa in Abuja on Tuesday. Naija News reports the decision to suspend Eta was based on his refusal to withdraw a suit filed against the party in court after the party leadership had instructed that all such cases be withdrawn.

item.title: Catherine Gmez - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Colombian social media star who has gained fame for her self-titled Instagram account. She has earned huge popularity for her casual chic fashion modeling often showcasing her physique. Before Fame She began posting to Instagram in April 2019. Trivia She has seen her Instagram audience grow to more than 100,000 followers. Family Life She has a daughter named Rylie with boxer Ryan Garcia. Associated With She and Daniela Rivera are both popular Colombian models on Instagram.

item.title: Corbin Bleu - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: He sang and danced his way to fame in Disney's High School Musical, earning a nomination for a Young Artist Award for Best Performance. Other major films and TV shows he has appeared in include Galaxy Quest, Mystery Men, ER, Hannah Montana, and The Good Wife.  Before Fame He appeared in commercials when he was two years old and studied jazz, dance, and ballet. He appeared in print ads for Target, Gap, and Toys R Us after signing with the Ford Modeling Agency in New York when he was four years old.

item.title: Darcey and Stacey Silva Will Meet with Georgi Rusev's Ex-Wife on Season 2 of Their TLC Show
item.description: Georgi Rusev is appearing alongside his fiancé, Darcey Silva, on the TLC series, 'Darcey and Stacey.' He recently got divorced, but who is his ex-wife? Source: GettyWhen viewers first met Darcey Silva in 2017 on Season 1 of 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days, she was an immediate scene-stealer. Though she originally rose to fame because of her rocky relationship with then-fiancé, Jesse Meester, and later with her beau, Tom Brooks, it soon became clear that Darcey and her twin sister, Stacey Silva, were entertaining on their own.

item.title: Desmond Dennis - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: R&B singer who is best known as making up one-third of the hip-hop collective SJ3. In 2011, he and his fellow group members released their debut album The School Days. Before Fame He grew up alongside his fellow group member Tone Stith. He and Tone eventually invited the third member, Kyle Thompson, after seeing him act in local play productions. Trivia In 2013, he and the group released their self-titled EP We Are SJ3.

item.title: Devyn Nekoda - Age, Family, Bio
Doe Boy - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Rapper who signed a deal with Freebandz after releasing his mixtape Boyz N Da Hood 2 in 2012. Some of his most popular tracks include "Don't Play That," "Mama Neva Understand" and "Letter to Future."  His 2022 song "3 AM IN LA" has accumulated over 4 million streams on Spotify. Before Fame He grew up in the Cleveland, Ohio area and began rapping seriously at age 13. Trivia In 2013, he was sentenced to 18 months in prison on an aggravated robbery charge.

item.title: Hasira ni hasara: Polisi ampiga risasi na kumuua mwalimu kufuatia deni la pombe
item.description: - Polisi huyo wa Utawala alimfyatulia risaasi mwalimu wa shule ya upili ua Kaputir mnamo Jumanne, Najuari - Susan Nashiru, mwalimu ambaye anamiliki baa alikorofishana na Wilfred Too, afisa wa polisi akimtaka alipe deni alilokuwa nalo - Afisa huyo kwa hasira alitwaa bunduki yake na kumpiga risasi mwalimu huyo mara sita kichwani - Mshukiwa alikamatwa na kuzuiliwa katika kituo cha polisi cha Kaakong' akisubiri kufikishwa mahakamani Afisa wa polisi wa Utawala anaripotiwa kumfyatulia risasi na kumuua mwalimu wa shule ya sekondari ya Kaputir kaunti ya Turkana mnamo Jumanne, Januari 12.

item.title: Heath Shuler - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American Democratic politician who served in the U.S. House of Representatives from 2007 to 2013. Before beginning his political career, he served as quarterback on such NFL teams as the Washington Redskins, the New Orleans Saints, and the Oakland Raiders. Before Fame After studying psychology at the University of Tennessee, he established a very successful real estate firm. Trivia He served as a whip for the Blue Dog Coalition, which was made up of moderate and conservative Democrats in the House.

item.title: Househelp Stabs Boss To Death In Lagos
item.description: A yet-to-be-identified woman residing in the Gbagada area ofLagos State reportedly met a tragic end after being fatally stabbed by her househelp. Naija News reports that the househelp, identified only as Peter, is currently on the run, with the timing of the murderous act still unclear. The sombre revelation came to light on Saturday, March 9, 2024, when the deceased’s son, visiting his mother, stumbled upon the harrowing scene. According to reports from Vanguard, he found his mother’s lifeless body on the staircase, a sight marred by blood, signalling a violent struggle.

item.title: Is Oscar Leaving 'Call Me Kat' for Good After That Heartbreaking Proposal?
item.description: Poor Oscar got his heart put through the wringer on Season 2 of 'Call Me Kat' after proposing to the titular character. Is he leaving the show? Source: Fox Poor Oscar's (Christopher Rivas) romantic wedding proposal to Kat (Mayim Bialik) quickly went downhill in Season 2, Episode 15 of Call Me Kat. He understandably found it heartbreaking that Kat said yes to his proposal, only to break up with him right after.

item.title: Ivan Zaytsev - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Volleyball player best known as a member of the Italian national team and VC Dynamo Moscow in Russian Volleyball Super League. He won his first Olympic medal in 2012, taking home bronze. Before Fame He was born in Spoleto, Italy and made his debut with RPA-LuigiBacchi.it Perugia in 2004. Trivia In 2013, he won the FIVB World League award for Best Outside Spiker and the CEV European Championship for Best Server.

item.title: Iyanya biography: age, wife, net worth, albums, latest song
item.description: What has made Iyanya so famous? The Nigerian songwriter, singer, and performer rose to popularity after winning the MTN Project Fame West Africa in 2008. He is well-known for his song Kukere. Some of the genres that he performs are Afropop and R&B. After winning the MTN Project Fame, he released his debut album titled My Story in 2011. He also released the singles No Time and Love Truly to support his first album.

item.title: Jakob Delgado - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Gained fame as one-third of the pop/rock band In Stereo; he competed alongside his band mates on The X Factor Australia. In 2018, he would venture into a solo career. Before Fame He performed as a solo artist before coming together to form In Stereo in mid-2015. Trivia Before going on the X Factor, he and In Stereo put out covers of songs by artists including Aston Merrygold and 5 Seconds of Summer. Family Life He is from Sydney, Australia.

item.title: Jorah Mormont Survived The Battle of Winterfell in an Alternate 'Game of Thrones' Ending
item.description: Jorah was originally going to survive the finale and betray Daenerys. Source: HBOIt's fair to say that Jorah Mormont went through a lot for Daenerys in Game of Thrones. While he was originally sent to spy on the Targaryens to earn a pardon from King Robert, Jorah quickly became Daenerys' most trusted adviser and friend. Jorah doesn't hide his love for Daenerys throughout the series, so sacrificing himself to save her from a horde of wights during the Battle of Winterfell seemed like a suitable end for the knight.

item.title: Muranga woman, 22, kills her 25-year-old husband after a quarrel
item.description: - The woman confirmed her husband came home drunk and picked a quarrel with her - It escalated to a fight which saw her stab him repeatedly - In the company of the deceased's uncle, she rushed him to hospital - He was pronounced dead on arrival at Murang'a county hospital Police in Kangema are holding a 22-year-old woman for stabbing to death her 25-year-old husband following a domestic quarrel.

item.title: My Wife Is HIV Positive - Man Asks Court To Dissolve His Seven-Yr-Old Marriage
item.description: A 38-year-old civil servant, Silas Dodo, has prayed an Upper Area Court in Mararraba, Nasarawa State, to dissolve his marriage with his wife because she is HIV-positive. Dodo, who lives at Masaka, Nasarawa State, told the court on Tuesday that he wanted to divorce his 35-year-old wife, he married in 2007. He told the court that his wife was found to be HIV-positive following a recent test they had. Dodo also told the court that he met his wife in 2002 at the Federal University of Technology, Yola, and they married in 2007 in a church.

item.title: Nnamdi Kanu Demands N20bn Compensation, Apologies From Malami
item.description: The battle between the Attorney General of the Federation and Minister of Justice, Abubakar Malami and the leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu seems not to end anytime soon as Kanu has demanded N20 billion as compensation from the minister. Naija News learnt that the IPOB leader demanded compensation from Malami following alleged defamatory and libellous claims against him. Kanu through his special counsel, Aloy Ejimakor stated that the minister claimed that he jumped bail despite a court order clearing him was libellous.

item.title: Samson Siasia Tells Super Eagles What To Do To Win 2023 AFCON
item.description: Former Super Eagles coach Samson Siasia says the three-time African champions need to play with confidence if they hope to win the Africa Cup of Nations in Ivory Coast. The Super Eagles will begin their campaign in the 2023 AFCON in Group A against Equatorial Guinea on January 14. They will play the hosts, Ivory Coast, on January 18, and end the group stage with a game against Guinea Bissau on January 22.

item.title: The U.S. Flag Looks Like It's Flying Backward on Military Uniforms Here's Why
item.description: The U.S. looks like it's flying backward on military uniforms, but why is that? There's actually a deep meaning behind it that some may find inspirational. Source: Getty ImagesUniforms of the U.S. military are meant to convey a few different things. Based on what someone is wearing, a person can identify the branch in which they serve, their rank, their accomplishments, and more (if they're aware of what the symbols mean).

item.title: What Was Neve Campbell's Salary for 'Scream 5'?
item.description: 'Scream 6' Is Down One of Its Biggest Stars — Who Is Exiting the Popular Franchise?By Jennifer TisdaleJun. 7 2022, Published 9:25 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesNeve Campbell Some people think it's gauche to talk about money, but we here at Distractify believe in full transparency when it comes to salaries, especially for women. Meryl Streep famously argued her way into double the salary offered for The Devil Wears Prada, while Jessica Chastain drew a strong line in the sand at one point in her career.
